messages.subject: OT - free book - tonight only
messages.msgSnippet: I just watched yesterday s episode of Oprah - it was one of the strangest shows I ve seen. I m still processing why it was so odd... but I wanted to let you
messages.messageBody:
I just watched yesterday's episode of Oprah - it was one of the
strangest shows I've seen. I'm still processing why it was so odd...
but I wanted to let you know, you can download Suze Orman's book,
Women & Money, for free until 8pm Eastern time. Sorry for the late
notice - I just found out! It downloads as an Adobe file, which you
can then save on your computer. The whole thing! I'm not a HUGE Suze
Orman fan, but I think this will be one of those take what you want,
leave the rest things - and the things I take will be very valuable.

Here's the link - http://tinyurl.com/2ss74m Just click "Women & Money"

peace,
Caren
